entities.description: Indicates whether the respondent paid for or bought marijuana in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent traded something for marijuana in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent got marijuana for free or shared someone else's marijuana in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent grew their own marijuana in the past 12 months.
The time frame of the past 12 months, including today's date.
The frequency of each response option regarding marijuana acquisition.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the time period of the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent paid for or bought marijuana in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent traded something for marijuana in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent got marijuana for free or shared someone else's marijuana in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent grew their own marijuana in the past 12 months.
Defines the frequency of each response option regarding marijuana acquisition in the survey.
